entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 06:56 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
